name: Urban Indian Center of Salt Lake
address: 120 West 1300 South, Salt Lake City, UT 84115
description: Offers hand drum-making workshops and sometimes drum circles, focusing on indigenous teachings and cultural connection. They do not appear to offer formal drum lessons
services: American-Indian-owned Drum lessons in Utah consultation

name: Paiute Indian Tribe of Utah
description: The Paiute Indian Tribe of Utah hosts "Native Youth – Native Flute & Drum Practice" sessions and "Native Youth – Cedar City Drum Practice" at their Youth & Senior Centers. These are practice sessions rather than formal lessons. Specific addresses and phone numbers for these practice sessions are not readily available
services: American-Indian-owned Drum lessons in Utah consultation

name: Mike Dale Drum Studios
address: Multiple locations in the Salt Lake City area, including Cottonwood Heights, Sandy, Draper, and Lehi
description: While not explicitly American Indian-owned, Mike Dale has been teaching drums in Utah since 1997 and offers lessons for all ages and levels. He offers a free trial lesson. His studio has multiple instructors, and it's possible some may have Native American heritage, but this is not specified
services: American-Indian-owned Drum lessons in Utah consultation

name: Danny Smith's Drum Lessons
address: Teaches at Boothe Music, his home in Springville, Utah, and online
description: Danny Smith has over 25 years of teaching experience and offers lessons for all ages and skill levels. He provides a free first lesson. His background is not specified as American Indian
services: American-Indian-owned Drum lessons in Utah consultation

name: The Piano Place
address: Multiple locations across Utah and Idaho, including Lehi, Draper, Farmington, Salt Lake City, South Jordan, Pleasant Grove, Saratoga Springs, Sandy, and St. George
description: Offers drum lessons for all ages and skill levels at various locations. Their instructors' backgrounds are not specified as American Indian
services: American-Indian-owned Drum lessons in Utah consultation

name: Music Academy of Utah
address: Two locations: 620 E 1700 S and 120 E 4700 S
description: Offers drum lessons for ages 8 and older, with a focus on personalized lesson plans. They offer a free trial lesson. Their instructors' backgrounds are not specified as American Indian
services: American-Indian-owned Drum lessons in Utah consultation

name: Utah Conservatory
address: Not specified, but offers in-person and remote instruction
description: Provides music instruction in various instruments, including drums, for all ages. Their faculty's ethnic background is not specified
services: American-Indian-owned Drum lessons in Utah consultation

name: Conquer You Cacao (Drum Making Workshops)
description: Offers drum-making workshops, which include a drum-making ceremony. While not lessons, these workshops focus on the creation and spiritual aspect of drums
services: American-Indian-owned Drum lessons in Utah consultation

name: Zion Canyon Flute & Drum Spirit
description: Offers classes and workshops in Springdale, Utah, including learning the native flute. While drum is mentioned in their name, specific drum lessons are not detailed

name: Drum Utah
description: Offers engaging drum circles and rhythm experiences for various groups, focusing on music, nature, and laughter. They do not appear to offer formal drum lessons
